# Amy Coughlan

::: text-center
### Title {.text-center}
:::

::: p
Ecologist interested in the trophodynamics of marine ecosystems, and how body size, predator-prey interactions and environmental attributes translate into the biomass and complex structuring of marine ecosystems.
